body: isn't page 9 supposed to go after page 23 ?
dafuq am i reading??? had some good chuckles though

This would probably be far more understandable if you removed the text altogether.  Forget narrative and character and just slap random sex scenes together!  I know it's sort of this author's style, but this must be a pain and a half to translate.  Not that anyone could tell if you translated it wrong.
